objects.text:
• Premium Dark Chocolate
• Luxury Gift Set

• Uplifts Mood & Well-being

product_details.name: Nooky Tempting Delights for uplifing mood (Packof 3) | Luxury Dark Chocolate Best Gift Set for Men & Women | instaeats

banner_details:
This visually engaging banner is structured into clean quadrants, balanced with geometric precision and warm earthy tones. The top left section features a bold heading ("heading") in vivid yellow accompanied by a lighter, sophisticated tagline ("tagline") and an italicized subheading ("subheading"), all layered over a soft brown circle and a deep reddish square. The right half highlights a central product image ("product_image") of a smiling woman holding a chocolate bar, adding a personal and lively touch.

The bottom left conveys product features in a clear bullet-point format ("description"), followed by the prominent price ("price") in bright yellow for attention. A contrasting dark brown rectangular CTA button ("cta_background") with encouraging text ("cta") invites immediate action. The design combines elegance with emotional appeal for a luxury chocolate gift set.

**Color Palette**:
- Deep Brown: #3D1C12
- Brick Brown: #4A2110
- Mahogany: #5C2915
- Cinnamon: #52271A
- Burnt Sienna: #8B4513
- Golden Yellow: #FFD700
- Light Beige: #E8C39E
- Soft Cream: #D2AB88
- Warm Taupe Circle: #C8A080
- Clean White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a rich and elegant color palette ideal for a sophisticated advertisement banner. The dominant tones include deep chocolate brown from the product packaging (Hex: #4B2E2A), complementing the deep burgundy-red of the model’s dress (Hex: #861F31). Her soft, glowing skin tone provides a natural contrast (Hex: #FBD2C3), while the cascading dark brown hair (Hex: #3C2415) adds depth and warmth. The golden logo text on the chocolate bar (Hex: #D4AF37) introduces a subtle luxury element. These tones blend seamlessly, with brown and red creating a warm, indulgent vibe, while gold highlights the product's premium quality and draws visual focus.
